metadata.title: Nord Trail Mt. Logan II Hiking Boots Men - Suede Waterproof Trekking Shoes
features: WATERPROOF: Seam-sealed suede leather and ballistic nylon mesh upper offers flexible support and quick-dry waterproof protection at all times. Superior blend of natural and synthetic materials designed for longevity and ease of use.
ENDURING COMFORT: The high-top shaft stabilizes the ankles while the padded collar, bellows tongue, and cushioned insole support your feet for hours of comfortable walking.
OUTDOOR PROTECTION: Trek the day with confidence! The reinforced rubber toe protector and CMEVA midsole protects the feet and absorbs shock and for a safer and happier hiking experience.
HIGH TRACTION GRIP: Designed with the latest technology, the rubber outsole provides high traction grip in a wide variety of terrains. Allows for greater surface contact and lateral stability.

LIGHTWEIGHT BOOT: Rather than bring you down with excess weight, these light and breathable shoes offer superior cushioning, elemental protection, and high energy return for those long days on the trail.
description: Founded in 2012, Nord Trail offers you the latest in hiking and safety footwear technology. Our products are made from the finest quality materials, crafted for long-lasting durability and sustained comfort, and all within family friendly pricing. Whether you are the hardcore adventure seeker, the weekend warrior, or the employee in need of industry standard safety boots, we invite you to #FindYourTrail.
